name: Prompt Shortcuts
description: Cross-platform prompt shortcuts — type a trigger keyword to expand it into a full prompt before sending to the AI.

shortcuts.description: List of prompt shortcuts. Each shortcut maps a trigger keyword to a prompt template.

trigger.description: Trigger keyword (e.g. /翻譯). Must start with /.

prompt.description: Prompt template. Use {{input}} as placeholder for user-provided text after the trigger.

shortcuts.label: Prompt Shortcuts
shortcuts.help: Define trigger keywords that expand into full prompts. Use {{input}} as placeholder.
